<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Remove all weapons from the given vehicle's weapon cargo space.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[clearWeaponCargo]] vehicleName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[clearWeaponCargo]] _truck;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[clearWeaponCargoGlobal]], [[addWeaponCargo]], [[addMagazineCargo]], [[clearMagazineCargo]], [[clearMagazineCargoGlobal]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearItemCargo]], [[clearItemCargoGlobal]]
</value></part></template>

</comment>
